title: Update contact phone numbers in footer

requirements.summary: Update the footer contact phone number list in the Layout component to display three phone numbers: 889700937, 6304843930, and +917095510215
acceptanceCriteria: The footer displays all three phone numbers: 889700937, 6304843930, and +917095510215
The phone numbers are displayed in a clear, readable format in the contact information section
Each phone number is clickable with a tel: link for mobile convenience
The styling matches the existing footer contact information design

file_operations.description: Update the footer contact phone number section to display three phone numbers (889700937, 6304843930, +917095510215) instead of the existing single phone number. Each number should be wrapped in a clickable tel: link for mobile convenience. Maintain the existing footer structure, styling, and layout while only modifying the phone number list in the contact information area.
